name: Chandler Inn

reviews.title: Excellent Value For The Price
reviews.text: This hotel, although not a 5 star hotel, is very much worth the money. It was clean, the staff was nice and the location was excellent. Just a short walk to the subway, next to the theatre district, 5-7 minutes from Newbury st. Yes the bathroom was small but for the price, you cannot complain. I would recommend this hotel to budget travellers and students.

reviews.title: Worst hotel I have ever been in.
reviews.text: Do not stay in this hotel unless you enjoy lying awake all night listening to people in nearby rooms having sex. The walls are so thin it sounds like they are in the room with you. Horrible uncomfortable beds, bathrooms needed cleaning, room tiny. I've never staying in such a horrible hotel before.
My husband and I stayed at the Chandler hotel in early October. The room was a good size, the bathroom a little small but had a very good shower, both were clean. The staff were very helpful.
reviews.title: Good hotel for the price

reviews.text: Spent the first 4 nights of our trip in this hotel and for the cash we paid it was great the location was great for the centre of town and for the 'T' stops. the staff were very friendly and gave us some good advice. The room we had was a corner room which has a much better view so try and request this. The bathroom is on the small side but your on holiday you don't spend 24 hrs in the loo !! It is a very mixed hotel i.e straight, gay, old, young but if you are prejudice then just don't book it and it might stop the bad review this place has gotten. The sheets were clean as were the towels the tea and coffee facilities were fine and the bed was comfy would stay again when visiting..great wee gem of place.
reviews.title: great stay, great staff , great location, great price

description: The Chandler Inn is a small European style Boutique Hotel located in Boston's hip and historic South End. Featuring 56 renovated Boutique Guest rooms designed to be both chic and comfortable by two of Boston's hottest interior designers. Complimentary wifi is available in every guest room.Located on Charming Chandler Street in Boston's South End, surrounded by beautiful tree lined streets, brick sidewalks and historic Brownstones. Within walking distance of Newbury Street, Tremont Street's Restaurant Row, Copley Square, numerous restaurants, shops, business centers and attractions.The Chandler Inn Hotel is staffed 24 hours a day with friendly, knowledgeable personnel. In addition, The Chandler Inn Hotel offers an online Concierge AP designed by Toursphere,featuring nearby restaurants, self guided walking tours, maps and shopping information to enhance your visit to Boston. The Chandler Inn Hotel makes the ideal home base for your next visit to Boston.
